title: employers in the activities referred to in this Order and of substantial numbers
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Industrial Training (Healthcare Industry)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Industrial Training (Healthcare Industry) 

Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited industrial training (healthcare industry) order 2020

title: employers in the activities referred to in this Order and of substantial numbers
heading: 2. The following activities are hereby declared to be designated industrial
text_raw:
2. The following activities are hereby declared to be designated industrial 

activities for the purposes of the Industrial Training Act 1967 (No. 5 of 1967): 

(a) 

(b) 

the provision of assistance to healthcare professionals in 
providing care for recipients of health or social care services; 
and 
the performance of clinical and/or personal care tasks under the 
direction or supervision of healthcare professionals, in each case 
within the competence of the relevant healthcare professional.
text_norm: 2 following activity hereby declared designated industrial activity purpose industrial training act 1967 (no 5 1967) (a) (b) provision assistance healthcare professional providing care recipient health social care service performance clinical personal care task direction supervision healthcare professional case within competence relevant healthcare professional

title: employers in the activities referred to in this Order and of substantial numbers
heading: In this Order:
text_raw:
3. 

In this Order: 

"healthcare professional" means, as the context admits, a medical 
practitioner, a registered nurse or a health or social care professional; 

"health or social care professional" means a registered member of a 
profession designated in accordance with section 4 of the Health and Social 
Care Professionals Act 2005; 

"health or social care services" means the activities referred to in section 
4(3) of the Health and Social Care Professionals Act 2005; 

"medical practitioner" has the meaning given in section 2 of the Medical 
Practitioners Act 2007; and 

"registered nurse" has the meaning given in section 2(1) of the Nurses and 
Midwives Act 2011. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 23rd April, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [760] 3 

Given under the Official Seal of An tSeirbhís 
Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna, 

 10 December 2020. 

SEAN AYLWARD 

SOLAS Chairman 

a member of An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus 
Scileanna, authorised by An tSeirbhís Oideachais 
Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna to act in that behalf. 

Given under the Official Seal of An tSeirbhís 
Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna, 

 10 December 2020. 

ANDREW BROWNLEE 

SOLAS CEO 

a member of An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus 
Scileanna, authorised by An tSeirbhís Oideachais 
Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna to act in that behalf.

title: employers in the activities referred to in this Order and of substantial numbers
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna was established under the 
Further Education and Training Act 2013 to promote training in industry and 
commerce. 

This Order defines the activities of the healthcare industry in relation to which 
An tSeirbhís Oideachais Leanúnaigh agus Scileanna shall exercise its functions 
in the creation of statutory apprenticeships. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [760] 5
